game.name: Granado Espada
game.genres: Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: Granado Espada, the long-standing MMORPG beloved in dozens of countries around the world for its unique control system that allows you to take the role of up to 3 different characters simultaneously! Now available in English to Southeast Asia players, from imcgames.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Granado Espada, the long-standing MMORPG beloved in dozens of countries around the world for its unique control system that allows you to take the role of up to 3 different characters simultaneously! Now available in English to Southeast Asia players, from imcgames.

reviewHighlights.text: dead PTW game disguised as a MMORPG. unless you get joy from afk-botting/building multiple accounts to solo missions, stop wasting your life here.
